rulesStrings.li: physical_description_root->An experimental exploration of unusual textures and forms, challenging conventional structure.
physical_description_root->Textural experiments and abstract gestures create a unique listening experiment.
r_middle_sentence_1->The record explores unconventional structures and timbres.
r_middle_sentence_2->Noise and space are used as compositional elements.
r_middle_sentence_3->Unexpected juxtapositions challenge listener expectations.
r_middle_sentence_4->Improvisation and chance operations surface in the arrangements.
r_middle_sentence_5->Fragments coalesce into a fragile, unpredictable whole.
r_middle_sentence_6->Textures are prioritized over traditional melody and harmony.
